update_every.title: Update every
update_every.description: The data collection frequency in seconds.

url.title: URL
url.description: The base URL of the Elasticsearch cluster.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The timeout in seconds for the HTTP request.

not_follow_redirects.title: Not follow redirects
not_follow_redirects.description: If set to true, the client will not follow HTTP redirects automatically.

cluster_mode.title: Cluster mode
cluster_mode.description: Controls whether to collect metrics for all nodes in the Elasticsearch cluster or only for the local node where the collector is running.

collect_node_stats.title: Collect node stats
collect_node_stats.description: Collect metrics about individual nodes in the cluster.

collect_cluster_health.title: Collect cluster health
collect_cluster_health.description: Collect metrics about the overall health of the cluster.

collect_indices_stats.title: Collect indices stats
collect_indices_stats.description: Collect metrics about individual indices in the cluster.

username.title: Username
username.description: The username for basic authentication (if required).

password.title: Password
password.description: The password for basic authentication (if required).

proxy_url.title: Proxy URL
proxy_url.description: The URL of the proxy server (if required).

proxy_username.title: Proxy username
proxy_username.description: The username for proxy authentication (if required).

proxy_password.title: Proxy password
proxy_password.description: The password for proxy authentication (if required).

headers.title: Headers
headers.description: Additional HTTP headers to include in the request.

tls_skip_verify.title: Skip TLS verification
tls_skip_verify.description: If set to true, TLS certificate verification will be skipped.

tls_ca.title: TLS CA
tls_ca.description: The path to the CA certificate file for TLS verification.

tls_cert.title: TLS certificate
tls_cert.description: The path to the client certificate file for TLS authentication.

tls_key.title: TLS key
tls_key.description: The path to the client key file for TLS authentication.

timeout.ui:help: Accepts decimals for precise control (e.g., type 1.5 for 1.5 seconds).
